episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4001_1101_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] accepted Lisia’s
challenge, and many people gathered to watch.

The audience roared with excitement as a
spectacular battle unfolded before them.
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4001_1001_:
I knew it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! 
You’re sooo strong!

*sigh*
I need to get better at Pokémon battles...
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4001_0402_:
Yep! I want to be able to hold my own against
everyone here!
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4001_1001_:
You see, a contest is going to be held on Pasio
soon, and I was actually asked to help with the
opening ceremony!

There’ll be four sync pairs competing at once, just
like in an actual contest....

but the Pasio contest will also include an onstage
battle segment!

If we were just being judged on our appeal, I 
know I’d be fine, but I’m not confident in my
battling. I don’t wanna disappoint the audience...

Ali is working so hard, so I want to get stronger,
too! That’s why I have to battle a lot!
If that’s the case, how about a battle with me?

Sorry to butt in! I was on my way to ask if
you wanted to get some Casteliacones when
I overheard your conversation!

What do you say to grabbing some dessert and
having a battle with me afterward?

Except...after this, I have some contest idol work
I need to take care of.

Can I take a rain check for tomorrow? Will you
two be free then?

That Altaria... Ali, was it? He’s so gorgeous and
adorable! Grooming him must be a full-time job!

Between taking part in contests, battling, and
being a contest idol, Lisia sure has a lot of irons
in the fire!

I thought I had my hands full back in Unova, but
she’s definitely teaching me a thing or two about
being busy!
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4002_1001_:
Phew! Boy, is it getting late! C’mon, Ali, let’s get
some more battle training in!

We made a promise to that Trainer we met
back in Hoenn!

We promised that we’d try to do a lot of different
things together, Ali!
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4003_1001_: Yeah! Give us all you got!
Here we go, Ali! We can’t let the audience down!
Oh no! Ali, are you OK?!
Gosh, you really got us there, Hilda!
Um, Lisia? Can I say something—
Not your most elegant performance, Lisia.

There’s something different about the way you
battle compared to them, Lisia.

I’m sure you know that better than anyone, 
don’t you?
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4003_0401_:
Yes, I know. That’s precisely why she needs to
hear this.
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4003_0302_:
She may have lost, but she did
her best!
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4003_0402_:
Yes, I know. But I’m not just talking about winning
or losing. That’s why she needs to hear this.
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4003_1001_:
But I know I’m still not good enough yet. I have to
work even harder!
Thanks, you two! I’ll see you later!

Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. 
I have to go talk to her.
There’s something important I need to tell her!
(What a wonderful friend you have, Lisia.)

(Though I was kind of hoping you’d be able to
figure out what you’re missing on your own.)

(I suppose what I was taught has since fallen out
of fashion, huh?)
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4004_1001_:
Hehehe! Boy, battles are really tough! I guess I
just have to—
I need to talk to you about our battle!

I wish you had been more focused on me and
Emboar during our battle!

It’s great that you’re always thinking about how to
entertain everyone, Lisia.

But during a Pokémon battle, you can’t be so
focused on the audience!

I don’t know a lot about contests or what it’s like
to be a contest idol...

but in battle, you have to be 100 percent focused!
Not just on your opponent—on your partner
battling alongside you, too!
I...need to focus on my partner...

Losing can be frustrating, but what’s more
frustrating is seeing you not reach your full
potential in battle!

Especially because I’ve seen how hard you and Ali
have been training!

I don’t think it would disappoint your fans at all if
you shifted your attention from them to the battle
at hand!

Don’t be afraid to give the battle your undivided
attention! Face your opponent head on with
everything you’ve got!

If we could have a match like that, I think people
would really enjoy watching it, no matter who
wins or loses!

...Hilda, would it be all right if I asked you for
another battle?
episode_event_ch0215_00_lutia/4005_1001_: OK... Take two! Here we go!
All right! We’re not gonna hold back!
Here it comes, Ali! Use Protect!
He withstood Emboar’s attack!
Yaaay! You’re the best, Ali! Now it’s our turn!
We’re not done yet!
Ali! Swoop in and attack!
Whoa!
Aw, man... We lost.
No way! Did we really just win, Ali?

Yeah! Congratulations, Lisia! That was a 
fun battle!
Yaaay, we did it, Ali! We beat Hilda together!

I’m not sure how to feel right now! I’m so happy
you won, but...I REALLY don’t like losing!
Bravo! What a magnificent battle, Lisia!
Uncle Wallace?!

It seems you’ve learned a valuable lesson about
Pokémon battles.

Superficial charm doesn’t make for an elegant
or appealing battle...

You have to display the power and skill you and
your partner have honed together!

The collision of powerful wills between two
Trainers in pursuit of victory creates such a
wonderful illusion!

Lisia, you and your partner have become a strong
sync pair here on Pasio.

I look forward to the day you come to
challenge me to a battle!
Thanks, Uncle Wallace!

Okeydokey! Time to challenge more Trainers to
prepare for the contest!

Oh! And if there’s some promising talent out
there, maybe I can scout them while I’m at it!

Hey, Lisia! I’m not gonna let you keep a winning
streak on me, OK?
I’m gonna win next time! Let’s battle again soon!

Sure thing! After we grab some Casteliacones
first, OK?!

[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Hilda!
Thanks a bunch!

I’m gonna keep working real hard with Ali on lots
of things.
Don’t forget to keep cheering us on!
